import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import { formatCurrency } from '../utilities/formatCurrency' export function StoreItem({id, name, price, imgUrl}) { const { getItemQuantity, increaseCartQuantity, decreaseCartQuantity, removeFromCart } = useShoppingCart(); const quantity = getItemQuantity(id); return ( {name} {formatCurrency(price)}
{quantity === 0 ? ( ) : (
{quantity} In Cart
)}
) }
